name: rally mic pod
description:
Product Features:
• Easy access mute button with LED status indicator
• Machined zinc frame to dampen vibration
• Adaptive beamforming mic array
• RightSound™ technology for automatic voice-levelling and noise suppression
• Optional accessories: Mic Pod Hub, Mic Pod Mount (Available in graphite and white), Mic Pod Extension Cable

Product Specifications:
• Frequency Response: 90Hz – 16kHz
• Sensitivity: >-27 dB +/-1dB @ 1Pa
• Microphone data rate output: 48 kHz
• Pickup Range: 4.5m
• Beamforming Elements: Four omnidirectional microphones forming eight acoustic beams
• Audio processing: AEC (Acoustic Echo Cancellation), VAD (Voice Activity Detector)
• Noise suppression: AI filter

Package Contents:
• Rally Mic Pod 989-000430 x1
• Documentation
